channel.title: Basic Components on Awesome React Native
channel.description: Recent content in Basic Components on Awesome React Native

item.title: Displaying Image from URL in React Native
item.description: In this blog post I will show you how to display an image from URL in React Native application. First step is create a new React Native project by command below on your terminal. npx react-native init DisplayImageFromURL Open created project on your code editor and clear current code in App.js file then implement App.js as steps below. Import components import React from 'react' import { View, Image } from 'react-native'
